title: Friendsgiving: Part 1
description:
It’s the first-ever Bachelor Happy Hour Friendsgiving, hosted by Rachel and Bryan Abasolo! Also joining them in the studio — and at the Friendsgiving table — are Kendall Long, Joe Amabile, Katie Morton, Eric Bigger and Tayshia Adams.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:

ThredUp: ThredUp.com/Bachelor

Native: NativeDeodorant.com/ code Bachelor
